text: No Mozes, if I leave, who is gonna tell you when you're being stupid?

choices.text: Luana, I think I can manage. You can go.
You're right, I want you to stay.

text: All her equipment will also be gone once you bury her.

choices.text: No, I need to take precautions first.

text: Are you back to beg me to join you?

choices.text: Yes, I would like you to come back.
No, I'm just here to gloat at you.

text: Ha! I knew it! You can't do without me!
Fine! I don't even wanna join you anymore!
Mozes... I was always the best of us two at counting. I cannot join you if there's no room.
